overview: This blond hunk starts off saying how he always wished he had a motorcycle, but I bet he didn't think he'd use it to cruise around from trick to trick, fucking, sucking, and cumming his way around California! He pounds ass poolside, he warms up one bottom with a banana in a Jeep, and a burglar leaves his nylon mask on while he slams a hot dad's ass! Don't miss all the man on man action in here!
title: Fast Sex
